# Introduction
The following CyTOF analysis pipeline is developed by the  IMC bioinformatics platform and utilizes state-of-the artexisting R pacakages and custom code. The goal of this pipeline is to provide a simple interface for users to visualize their FCS files, transform, visualize and cluster their mass cytometry data.

# Installation Instructions
At the moment, this pipeline is installed on the Snyder server. If you have an account on Snyder, you can access the pipeline without any further installation.

If you wish to install this on a local lab server, please contact Hena Ramay @ hena.ramay\@ucalgary.ca.
